name: ambulance
description:
How did you use Houdini to make your game? 

We used a tool to create roads all across the city. We used another houdini tool for layout of the city map to create procedural buildings.

List everything that was made before the jam. Pre-built, assets, textures, etc - 

textures and the chracter

Which game engine or platform did you use to make your game?
Unity

Besides Houdini, what other tools did you use to make your game? 

Maya and after effects

List instructions and tips for playing your game here. 

You have to pick up as many patients as possible and take them to the hospital. Use wasd to move the ambulance. Use E to action and use the cursor to move the camera.

You have 10 minutes to be the hero of the city!

TEAM

Miriya
